title: Fake News: Pope Benedict XVI Is NOT Dead | Lead Stories
subtitle: A fake twitter account pretending to be the Archbishop of Salzburg claims that Pope-emeritus Benedict XVI has passed away in...
author: leadstories.com
vclaim:
A fake twitter account pretending to be the Archbishop of Salzburg claims that Pope-emeritus Benedict XVI has passed away in following tweet (archived here):

But the twitter account in question was only created last month and contains a tweet (archived here) announcing it is all a prank:

While we can't confirm at this time if Tommasso Debenedetti is really behind the account, the man has been famous for perpetrating various hoaxes through social media in order to prove how easy it is to do so nowadays.
